nodes.text: A drone was a member of the Yuuzhan Vong species who served as a shaper. During the Yuuzhan Vong War, it at one time reported to Warmaster Tsavong Lah about the process of the conversion of Jacen Solo, though its mumbling and exhaustive report soon bored the warrior, prompting Nom Anor to explain while the drone left the room hurriedly.
